snippet: Fox issued a correction and an apology after “Le Petit Journal,” a mock news program, satirized the American channel for reporting on “no-go zones” for non-Muslims.
abstract: French television show Le Petit Journal has made Fox News target of its satirical humor, in response to American channel's false reporting about areas of Paris that are 'no-go zones' for non-Muslims in its coverage of terrorist attacks in city; Le Petit Journal turned to its audience to engage in Twitter and email campaign to draw out response from Fox News.

byline.contributor: Robert Mackey contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Fox issued a correction and an apology after “Le Petit Journal,” a mock news program, satirized the American channel for reporting on “no-go zones” for non-Muslims.

headline.main: Fox News Becomes the Unwilling Star of a French TV Satire
headline.print_headline: Fox News Becomes the Unwilling Star of a French TV Satire
